entry.title: about yacc143
entry.summary:
Old-style nerd. Interests include all kinds of gadgets, programming, some politics, ...

And yes, the yacc stands for that "yet another ..." tool that deals in languages recognizable by stack machines, sigh. As mentioned, nerd alarm.
